document.full_text: sony corp said it would take at least "a few more days" to restore service to its online playstation network, which was breached by hackers in one of the largest internet break-ins of all time.
document.title: sony: no date yet for playstation network return
lines_and_colors: sony corp said it would take at least "a few more days" to restore service to its online playstation network, which was breached by hackers in one of the largest internet break-ins of all time.
